timeline.bodyText: Seems like a lot of duplicated code between the 2 endpoint Test classes. Can we move this Test into the other class? We don't necessarily need a unit test for every endpoint class.

Shouldn't this just be IOException? From

Why do we need to set leaderNode to "" on exception? It can be null, and handled in the UI maybe.
